## Reading data and wangle

```{r}
# Importing dataset
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2022, week = 10)
erasmus <- tuesdata$erasmus
iso<- read_delim("country_names.csv", delim=';')

erasmus %>% View()

```


## Explore data

```{r}
erasmus %>% count(academic_year)

# Sending country
erasmus %>% count(sending_country_code) %>% 
  mutate(sending_country_code = fct_reorder(sending_country_code, n)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(n, sending_country_code)) +
  geom_col()

# Receiving country
erasmus %>% count(receiving_country_code) %>% 
  mutate(receiving_country_code = fct_reorder(receiving_country_code, n)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(n, receiving_country_code)) +
  geom_col()

```
